name: Windows-Driver-Input-MCP
description: Dedicated MCP server for driver-level keyboard/mouse input on Windows (IbInputSimulator).
long_description: This MCP server exposes strictly driver-level input tools backed by IbInputSimulator (DLL first, AHK optional). It avoids PyAutoGUI fallbacks to ensure OS-native injection for reliability across games, protected apps, and non-English layouts.

tools.name: Input-Info
tools.description: Return backend readiness and rate limiter settings

tools.name: Move-Tool
tools.description: Move cursor to [x,y] with rate-limited stepping

tools.name: Drag-Tool
tools.description: Drag from [x,y] to [x,y] using driver-level injection

tools.name: Type-Tool
tools.description: Type text via driver-level injection: method=unicode|clipboard|vk

tools.name: Shortcut-Tool
tools.description: Send a keyboard shortcut like 'ctrl+c' or 'win+r'

tools.name: Scroll-Tool
tools.description: Scroll vertically or horizontally at optional [x,y] using driver/OS-level events

tools.name: Combo-Tool
tools.description: Hold multiple keys together for duration (e.g., ['shift','w'])

tools.name: Desktop-Info
tools.description: Return virtual screen origin/size and monitor count

tools.name: Window-Info
tools.description: Return active window title/class and rect [l,t,r,b]

tools.name: Windows-List
tools.description: Enumerate windows; top-level or children via parent_hwnd. Filters: query, only_visible, include_minimized, include_cloaked, limit

tools.name: Windows-Select
tools.description: Select a window and return hwnd (index or first match by query; supports parent_hwnd and visibility flags)

tools.name: Windows-Activate
tools.description: Bring a window to front and optionally toggle topmost or show/restore/minimize/maximize

tools.name: Windows-SetPos
tools.description: Move/resize window via SetWindowPos; supports z-order changes (topmost/notopmost/top/bottom)

prompts.name: Send-Shortcut
prompts.description: Send a keyboard shortcut like 'ctrl+c' or 'win+r'.

prompts.name: Activate-Window
prompts.description: List/select a window and activate it.

prompts.name: Drag-From-To
prompts.description: Drag from one point to another.
